name: GlitchBounce
description:
Stay alive by bouncing projectiles back. If you don't match the incoming color you lose. 

I built this project during some free time during  a single week ( Week of May 4th). Currently attempting to build a #gameaweek  for as long as I can manage. 

This is also my #tweetweetjam entry. Comes in at 558 characters. 

Head here for a mobile-friendly version ->  https://codemusings.org/gameaweek/3_glitchbounce/

Controls

Every pico-8 button toggles the circle's color.
